pages.text: man yutiʿi l-rasula faqad ataʿa l-laha waman tawalla fama arsalnaka ʿalayhim hafizan
wayaquluna taʿatun fa-idha barazu min ʿindika bayyata taifatun min'hum ghayra alladhi taqulu wal-lahu yaktubu ma yubayyituna fa-aʿrid ʿanhum watawakkal ʿala l-lahi wakafa bil-lahi wakilan
afala yatadabbaruna l-qur'ana walaw kana min ʿindi ghayri l-lahi lawajadu fihi ikh'tilafan kathiran

wa-idha jaahum amrun mina l-amni awi l-khawfi adhaʿu bihi walaw radduhu ila l-rasuli wa-ila uli l-amri min'hum laʿalimahu alladhina yastanbitunahu min'hum walawla fadlu l-lahi ʿalaykum warahmatuhu la-ittabaʿtumu l-shaytana illa qalilan
faqatil fi sabili l-lahi la tukallafu illa nafsaka waharridi l-mu'minina ʿasa l-lahu an yakuffa basa alladhina kafaru wal-lahu ashaddu basan wa-ashaddu tankilan
man yashfaʿ shafaʿatan hasanatan yakun lahu nasibun min'ha waman yashfaʿ shafaʿatan sayyi-atan yakun lahu kif'lun min'ha wakana l-lahu ʿala kulli shayin muqitan
wa-idha huyyitum bitahiyyatin fahayyu bi-ahsana min'ha aw rudduha inna l-laha kana ʿala kulli shayin hasiban
